= Getting Started with Re-Mote =

The Re-Mote Testbed Framework consists of 4 basic components:

 * DatabaseComponent
 * WebServiceComponent
 * MoteControlComponent
 * ClientComponent

Before deploying a testbed, please read about the SecurityConsiderations.
